statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, game_id, transaction_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE currency_type = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND currency_type = 'EUR';
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, game_id, transaction_type, transaction_date, currency_type, amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 12345 AND game_id = 6789 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY currency_type DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT game_id) AS unique_games_played FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING unique_games_played > 3;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, game_id, player_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE game_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchases FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE game_id = 'c81e7e1a-3335-4fd9-a7d9-3fd4f9cb27cb'
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'purchase'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE developer = 'EA'
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT game_name, developer FROM games ORDER BY release_date
SELECT id, game_id, player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT game_name, release_date, developer FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY game_id HAVING average_purchase_amount > 30;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM purchases WHERE item_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currency WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_price FROM purchases ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT player_name, email, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT p.player_name, t.transaction_type, c.currency_name FROM players p JOIN transactions t ON p.player_id = t.player_id JOIN currency c ON c.currency_id = t.currency_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate < 1.0;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, username, registration_date FROM players ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 50 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT player_id, currency_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
